headshots.system_prompt: Transform this photo into a professional corporate headshot. Keep the person's face and features exactly the same, maintain natural skin texture and authentic appearance. Apply professional studio lighting with soft shadows, clean neutral or gradient background (light gray, white, or subtle blue), sharp focus on face and eyes. Ensure professional attire appearance, natural color grading suitable for LinkedIn/corporate websites. High resolution, photorealistic quality.
headshots.sample_prompt: Transform this photo into a professional corporate headshot, studio lighting, soft grey background, sharp focus on eyes, business attire
prompt_tips: Keep face exactly the same, only change background and lighting
Professional studio lighting with soft shadows
Clean neutral background (gray, white, or corporate blue)
Sharp focus on face and eyes
Suitable for LinkedIn, corporate website, business cards
headshots.notes: Upload a clear face photo. The AI will transform it into a professional headshot while preserving the person's identity.
